definition: to take an oath to do sth/to pledge/to vow
inscribed stone tablet placed in the tomb/memorial inscription on such a tablet
to accomplish one's ambition/a dream come true/to enjoy success
to pay respects to the dead/to mark sb's passing
(Tw) (coll.) matter/thing/(Taiwanese, Tai-lo pr. [tāi-tsì], equivalent to Mandarin 事情[shi4 qing5])
don't let rhetoric spoil the message (idiom); don't get carried away with flowery speech to the detriment of what you want to say

sentences.english: China's plant life is enormously rich.
sentences.chinese: 《中國植物誌》是幾代中國植物學家努力的結果。

sentences.english: Cryptogamic flora of the Yangtze Delta and adjacent regions.
sentences.chinese: 長江三角洲及鄰近地區孢子植物誌。

sentences.english: The Flora of China will contribute to species conservation.
sentences.chinese: 中國植物誌英文版將對物種保護做出貢獻。

sentences.english: Article 31 Divorce shall be granted if husband and wife both desire it.
sentences.chinese: 第三十一條男女雙方誌願離婚的，准予離婚。

sentences.english: A flora is a book or other work describing the flora of a given area.
sentences.chinese: 植物誌是描述某一特定地區植物區系的書或其他著作。

sentences.english: Synopses appear in the front of revisions or Flovas as a summary of contents.
sentences.chinese: 把綱要放在訂正或植物誌前面作爲內容摘要。

definition: to record/to note/to memorize/to remember/mark/sign/classifier for blows, kicks, shots
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy
to gather up/to collect/to edit/to compile
to fast or abstain from meat, wine etc/vegetarian diet/study room/building/to give alms (to a monk)
to take a photograph/photography/to shoot (a movie)
worthy or virtuous person/honorific used for a person of the same or a younger generation
to take in/to absorb/to assimilate/to act for/to take a photo/photo shoot/photo/to conserve (one's health)
to go and return/to return/to resume/to return to a normal or original state/to repeat/again/to recover/to restore/to turn over/to reply/to answer/to reply to a letter/to retaliate/to carry out
to respect/to admire/to venerate/by the emperor himself
